reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Supporting India’s Progress Towards 95-95-95 through EMTCT, Interventions among Incarcerated Populations, Integrated Service Delivery for High Risk and Bridge populations and systems strengthening

description.narrative: India - HIV - Solidarity and Action Against The HIV Infection in India - SAATHII. This program has the following goals: Achieving zero new infections, zero AIDS-related deaths and zero AIDS related stigma & discrimination. The objectives of this program are: Reduce new infections by 80% by 2024. Ensure 95% of estimated PLHIV know their status by 2024. Ensure ART initiation and retention of 95% PLHIV for sustained viral suppression by 2024. Eliminate mother-to-child transmission of HIV and syphilis by 2020. Eliminate HIV/AIDS related stigma and discrimination by 2020. Facilitate sustainable NACP service delivery by 2024

description.narrative: Living support to client/ target population (LSCTP)

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for IND-H-SAATHII
Percentage of pregnant women who know their HIV status
TCS-other 1: Proportion of PLHIV in active care(both on ART + Pre ART) at ART centres received at least one of the Care & Support services provided by CSC.
Percentage of people newly diagnosed with HIV initiated on ART
Number of people in prisons or other closed settings that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Number of people who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
TCS-other 2: Proportion of PLHIV who have at least one family member or sexual partner referred for HIV testing and received test result.
Percentage of infants born to HIV-positive women receiving a virological test for HIV within 2 months of birth
Percentage of HIV-exposed infants receiving a virological test for HIV within 2 months of birth
HTS Other-1: Percentage of other vulnerable population who have received an HIV test during reporitng period and know their results (spouses of HIV positive pregnant women)
Percentage of HIV-positive women who received ART during pregnancy and/or labour and delivery
Percentage of HIV-positive pregnant women who received antiretrovirals to reduce the risk of mother-to-child transmission
Impact indicator for IND-H-SAATHII
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
HIV I-other 1: Percentage of adults (15-49 years) who are HIV infected
HIV incidence among 15-49 age group
Estimated percentage of children newly infected with HIV from mother-to-child transmission among women living with HIV delivering in the past 12 months
Percentage of people living with HIV
New HIV infections among children
HIV I-other 2: Estimated number of annual AIDS related death (all ages)
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
Outcome indicator for IND-H-SAATHII
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of (estimated) people living with HIV who have been tested HIV-positive
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
